phrases: Open your mind.
Open your mind.
Far beyond the deep blue Earth, you and I shall meet...
AH! MY GODDESS
AH! MY GODDESS
A snow-white feather will come fluttering down, swaying gently in the air.
Without holding back, I want to envelope you, my one and only love.
I know I have the power to protect the one I love, right here in my hands.
Open your mind.
Just as I have always dreamed.
Let the wind carry off your hopes, faraway.
I have wings nobody can see.
Look, you have them, too.
They will take us to where we can be free.
Anyone can be free.
The sky is so blue...
Ah...
What is wrong?
Nothing.
It is just that I feel so pathetic, looking like this.
I just want to go back to normal soon.
Do you?
But Keiichi, I think you are quite lovely.
That is not the point, see...
As long as I am looking like this, I cannot even show myself outside.
I have not been to class in 3 days now.
Keiichi...
Keiichi?
I would like you to let me handle this.
Keiichi, sorry to keep you waiting!
This will turn you back to normal!
What are you doing?
What do you think?
You will not stand out in these clothes, no matter where you go!
I told you, that is not the point...
Oh?
You mean you would prefer a different style of clothes?
No, no...what I mean is...
There!
No, no...what I mean is...
How sweet!
What is she doing?
Ah!
What Would not I Give for an Angel With White Wings?!
Thanks, I appreciate it.
I am so much more comfortable as a man.
Well, now you owe me big time, Keiichi.
But you are the one who made that potion, Urd!
But it was Skuld who made you take it.
Is that Belldandy singing?
Along with Holy Bell...
By the way, what exactly is an angel to a goddess?
Well, to put it simply, she is there for support.
There are some high-level magical spells that cannot be cast without an angel.
Yeah?
And also, the angel is like a symbol for a goddess's soul and condition.
Oh, I see, when Belldandy got sick, it affected her angel, too.
Well, there you go.
Every full-fledged goddess has her own angel.
So then you have one, too, Urd.
An angel?
Well, yes.
Big Sister!
Hello, Skuld.
That was so... that was so beautiful just now!
Your singing, and Holy Bell's too!
Thank you!
Big Sister...um...uh, you see...
What is it?
Well, the thing is...um...I...
I was thinking I would like an angel, too!
What?
Because you are not a full-fledged goddess until you have your own angel, right?
I cannot wait to be just like you, Big Sister, so...
I am proud of you, Skuld!
Huh?
I am proud of you, Skuld!
You have found your sense of responsibility as a goddess!
Huh?
Well, not exactly, but...
We would better start your training at once!
Huh?
We would better start your training at once!
I just want to have an angel like you!
You have decided to take this seriously!
I just want to have an angel like you!
I just want to have an angel like you!
As your older sister, I cannot be happier.
I just want to have an angel like you!
What shall we have you practice first?
I am the goddess of the Pillar that controls the workings of Heaven and Earth.
I bid you now in my name, release yourself from the chains of the earth...
There!
There!
There!
Come on!
No one has ever mastered this without some difficulty at first.
Do not worry.
If you just keep working at it, I know you will be able to do it.
I know!
Behold!
I will use a Gravity Canceller Magnum!
You must not use a device like that!
I will use a Gravity Canceller Magnum!
I did it!
That is what you wanted me to do, right, Big Sister?
Magic is a power that comes from within.
You must not depend on outside sources.
But I am not like you, Big Sister.
I do not have any talent for magic.
But is not that why we are practicing?
Urd!
But is not that why we are practicing?
Only those who have achieved their goals can talk about talent.
You have not accomplished anything yet!
You shut up!
All I want is to have an angel like Big Sister!
It has nothing to do with whether or not I can use magic!
Oh yes it does.
Is that true, Big Sister?
Yes.
To have an angel, you must first have enough power to support her.
That is why you must practice magic spells, to enhance your power.
Oh, is that right...
In other words, it is 100 years too soon for you to have an angel.
Start practicing more diligently!
Who do you think you are?
Butting in and acting like some hotshot!
Well, I am a hotshot.
See that?
It is a piece of cake!
Grr!
Then what about yours, Urd?
My what?
Anyone who talks like such a hotshot must have the most amazing angel ever!
Urd...
You bet I do!
You cannot even imagine how magnificent this angel of mine is.
After all, I am just way out of your league, you know...out of your league!
I hate you, Urd!
Skuld!
What a little baby she is, huh?
Urd!
It is all right.
Just make sure you get Skuld to understand something...
Urd!
Urd, are you there?
Huh?
Why do not we take a walk together?
All right.
I guess I will join you.
All right!
Well, hello!
Urd...
What is it?
Listen...
Yes?
The angel...
Urd!
How did you feel when you first got your angel?
Were not you scared?
I know I was scared.
You are still thinking about that day...
I am sorry I made you worry.
You are still thinking about that day...
Urd!
She who is closest to me... who knows me better than anyone else.
She who is the mirror-image of my innermost soul.
That is right.
Your angel is the reflection of your soul.
Your other self...
Come forth, angel!
Who am I kidding?
Of course she would not come out.
Aha!
This is my chance!
I thought something was fishy...
Urd does not have an angel either!
That means if I can manage to get an angel before Urd does...
Too cool...
That would rock... that would really, really rock!
All right, then...
I am going to start practicing my magic spells again!
Ta da!
With the help of my Virtual Simulator'Mr. Heartthrob' Model 156, I can...
Training should be conducted in a scientific way, after all.
Why do I have to take part in this too?
Do not worry.
This simulator is not just for magic...it has a wide variety of applications.
I am going to get my helmet back the way it was, right?
Stop whining.
One has to make sacrifices in the name of scientific progress.
Switch on!
Darn, that is a wicked curve!
Oh man, I missed the corner!
No, no...
I am not done yet!
I have yet to unleash my full power!
I am the king of Nekomi Ridge!
My experiment was a success!
Just look at the way Keiichi's acting.
At this rate, I will be using magic in no time!
Just you wait, Urd.
I am going to show you what I can do when I really put my mind to it!
I did it!
I finally got it to levitate!
Okay.
One more time!
Nothing's levitating...what in the world does she think she is doing?
Now that I think of it, was there a time when I was just like her?
I am pleased to meet you, Big Sister.
I wished I could be just like her.
I am remembering that day again.
Even though I know it is pointless, no matter how many times I look back.
What was it that Belldandy said that day?
Hey, I did not realize how quiet it is become.
She is hopeless!
All she has to do is train hard, and she will get to meet her angel...
Well, I guess I have no right to talk...
Why did not I realize it sooner?
What is the point of casting virtual magic if I cannot use it in the real world?
At this rate, I am never going to be able to control an angel!
Hey, were not you going to show me up big time?
It is just like I said... it is 100 years too soon for you!
Wait, that is it!
It is the results that matter!
As long as I learn to use some kind of really amazing magic, anything goes!
This time around, I am beyond serious!
I am home.
I cannot believe I was such a moron.
Why the heck did I run all the way up Nekomi Ridge for no reason?
Huh?
Uh-oh.
So it finally died on me, huh?
Wait, do not tell me...
Well, you do not have to tell me who was behind this.
Done!
Now that I have this, I am sure to get an angel before she does!
I see.
So that is the reason, huh?
Oh, please.
I was just borrowing it for a minute!
What is this gigantic thing?
Just listen and be struck with awe!
Ta da!
Power Amp Alpha 707!
This device will amplify my powers...
Did not Belldandy tell you to stick to training?
You be quiet!
I do not need steady training when I have the power of science at my fingertips.
Switch on!
Let us go, Alpha 707!
What is that?
Urd!
What is going on?
This is a high-level water spell...
But...
Keiichi!
Do not worry, she is just unconscious.
I see.
It is that device that is amplifying her power.
Keiichi, I am going to open up the wall now!
It is no good.
The wind-elemental spell is not strong enough.
The only way to break through that wall of water is with a fire-elemental spell!
Urd...
No, I cannot.
Urd...
Urd!
I know you have not been using your angel all this time...
But please, just this once!
It is not that I do not use her.
I cannot use her.
What?
Ever since I was a child, I have always suspected...
That is why I was a little scared when I swallowed the angel's egg.
But even so, deep down inside I expected it to happen...
But that is not what came to pass.
And when I was confronted with reality, I could not stop myself from screaming.
You heard me that day, did not you?
'Do not ever come out again!'
Do not ever come out again!
Urd...
Angels must always obey their goddesses...
Belldandy!
Keiichi?
There is something wrong with Skuld!
This is terrible!
That device can only force power out.
If we do not do something, Skuld will lose all of her powers!
Urd!
I cannot take back what I said.
I am the one who ordered my angel never to appear again.
Urd!
There is nothing I can do now.
Urd!
Believe in yourself, Urd.
I know you will be able to meet her.
I have seen that smile somewhere before.
Urd!
I would forgotten, you see...
What?
I would forgotten, you see...
Why I wanted to have an angel.
That is right, I would forgotten.
I am pleased to meet you, Big Sister.
Because I wished I could be...
Like Belldandy!
No matter what you may look like, you are my other self.
Do not ever come out again!
Thank you, Belldandy...
You have such a lovely angel!
Come forth, World of Elegance!
We meet at last...
Consumed by fire!
I am never going to let you go again.
Never!
Skuld, I hope you get to meet yours soon, too.
An angel's egg...
I am sure that day is not far off...
Skuld!
Hey...hey!
So you did have an angel, too, Urd!
Of course!
Does not that annoy you?
Look at us, look at us!
Urd!
I do not think I can stand this!
Keiichi!
Phone's ringing!
Come on, is not anyone around?
Yes, hello?
What?
We are back.
Huh?
What is the matter, Urd?
Urd?
What is the matter?
Hello?
Oh...yes?
All right.
What is wrong?
Oh, um, that was the Almighty on the phone...
The Almighty?
He is suspending Urd's license as punishment for walking off the job the other day.
Goddesses can get their licenses suspended?
Yes.
Goddesses can get their licenses suspended?
During the suspension period, you cannot use your powers as a goddess.
Hey!
Please do not go!
My little angel!
I finally got to see you again!
So that is the deal, huh?
I finally got to see you again!
I hate getting my license suspended!
Always believe in yourself and your Dreams.
You have a wing!
Always believe in yourself and your Dreams.
You have a wing!
I love you so much it hurts...
And it hurts me that I cannot tell you how I feel.
You and I have matching hearts...
So we must share the same scars deep down inside.
But now that I am in your arms, I think I can catch...
Nobody else matters...
All we have to do is gaze at each other.
It is all right for your heart to flutter...
All we have to do is love each other.
Open your heart, and ride that favorable wind.
Do not run away from happiness.
I will always be waiting for you.
So come rest your wings anytime.
It is all right to cry... anytime you need to.
I just want to see you again...
All we have to do is love each other.
Open your heart, and ride that favorable wind.
I just want you to be happy.
A pure white soul clashes with demon-black blood...
When that balance is broken, she is transformed into the Lord of Terror.
Next episode: Ah! The Devil's Whisper Coming from an Urn?
Uh-oh, look what is happening to my bike!
